messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] An apology from AnaMaria
messages.msgSnippet: ***My words were misunderstood. ..when I commented on some posts a while back.....I take responsibility for my careless communication. ...I think this list is
messages.messageBody:
***My words were misunderstood. ..when I commented on some posts a while back.....I take responsibility for my careless communication. ...I think this list is great sorry for trying to change it and offending Sandra in the process.***

Misunderstandings happen sometimes! That's why writing clearly and really thinking about it first helps lots, and assuming good intent. This is a very different and special kind of list, largely because of the way the moderators keep it. Something that I learned a long time ago, was that when I felt defensive, that was a big clue that there was area that I needed to work on within my self and my thoughts. I would walk away and not respond and just think about stuff. Meanwhile the list would go on peacefully without my defensiveness adding negativity to other people's thoughts and writings!





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: An apology from AnaMaria
messages.msgSnippet: My words were misunderstood...when I commented on some posts a while back.....I take responsibility for my careless communication....I think this list is great
messages.messageBody:
My words were misunderstood...when I commented on some posts a while back.....I take responsibility for my careless communication....I think this list is great sorry for trying to change it and offending Sandra in the process.

I am going forward and learning from my mistakes. I appreciate the hard work it takes to maintain this list.

AnaMaria










[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
